title: To-do List
description: Saves your tasks in local storage. Emails you your todo list.

title: Hex Colour Guess
description: Guess the hex code of the colour! A simple web minigame made using NextJS.

title: CPU-S Simulator
description: A web app that simulates a basic CPU and allows you to write and run assembly code

title: Planner
description: A web app for keeping track of meetings.

title: Word Guess
description: A wordle clone with some extra features. Fetches words using a random word API.

title: Word Finder
description: A website that helps you solve wordles. Fetches words using a random word API.

title: Data Channel Monitor
description: An arduino program for displaying and interacting with data channels using an lcd screen and buttons.

title: Computer Accessories Shop
description: An application for customers to buy devices and admins to manage stock.

title: Wedding Venues
description: A website for searching for a wedding venue.

title: Library Book Loans
description: An application for librarians to manage book loans and analyze trends to give personalised book reccomendations.

title: Adventure Game
description: A 2D sandbox game featuring infinite procedurally generated terrain, building, mining, crafting NPCs with pathfinding and combat. Created for my A-Level CS Coursework
